programme.title: Leprechaun In the Hood
programme.desc: When three rappers want to get even with a pimp, they unleash a leprechaun who goes on a killing rampage.

programme.title: Leprechaun VI: Back 2 Tha Hood
programme.desc: A woman discovers a chest of gold only to discover that the treasure belongs to an evil leprechaun.

programme.title: 2 Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: An stand-up comic moves to L.A. to pursue a film career after clips of his act make him an online sensation.

programme.title: Mac and Devin Go to High School
programme.desc: Rappers Snoop Doog and Wiz Khalifa team up to create this ultimate stoner comedy about high school.

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as a cop working to clear his friend's name of murder and theft.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand
programme.desc: Terrence Howard plays a proud theater owner defending his business from developers. Co-stars Dolph Lundgren.

programme.title: Who Can I Run To?
programme.desc: Monica, a former R&B star, reunites with her group and finds faith and redemption through gospel music.

programme.title: The Women of Brewster Place
programme.desc: A multigenerational story of the lives of several black women who call an inner-city tenement home.

programme.title: Foxy Brown
programme.desc: Pam Grier goes undercover to get revenge on the mobsters who murdered her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Temptations
programme.desc: Biopic of the singers who formed the hit Motown musical act, The Temptations.

programme.title: The Temptations
programme.desc: Biopic of the singers who formed the hit Motown musical act, The Temptations.

programme.title: Youngblood
programme.desc: An inner-city teen seeks escape through a local gang leader, whose war on drugs hits close to home.

programme.title: Soldier Boyz
programme.desc: A group of prisoners heads to Vietnam to rescue a VIP's daughter, with freedom promised to those who survive.
